gmail_messages.subject: Urgent: Project deadline moved to Friday
gmail_messages.body: Hi team, I need to inform you that the project deadline has been moved to Friday. Please ensure all deliverables are ready by then. This is critical for our client presentation.

gmail_messages.subject: Meeting reminder: Weekly standup at 2 PM
gmail_messages.body: Reminder: You have a weekly standup meeting scheduled for today at 2:00 PM. Please prepare your updates on current project status and any blockers.

gmail_messages.subject: Action required: Review and approve design mockups
gmail_messages.body: Please review the attached design mockups for the new feature. I need your approval by end of day so we can proceed with development. Let me know if you have any feedback or changes needed.

gmail_messages.subject: Follow up: Client feedback on proposal
gmail_messages.body: Thank you for the proposal. We have some feedback and would like to schedule a call to discuss the changes. Please let me know your availability this week.

gmail_messages.subject: Re: Budget approval for Q1 initiatives
gmail_messages.body: Your budget request for Q1 initiatives has been approved. Please proceed with the implementation. Remember to submit expense reports monthly.

zoom_meetings.transcript: Manager: Let's start with project updates. User: I completed the API integration and started working on the frontend components. Teammate1: I'm still working on the database schema. Manager: Good progress. Any blockers? User: I need the design mockups approved to continue. Manager: I'll follow up with the design team. Teammate2: I'm blocked on the authentication flow. Manager: Let's schedule a separate meeting for that.
zoom_meetings.summary: Team discussed project progress. User completed API integration and needs design approval. Teammate2 has authentication blockers.
action_items: Follow up with design team for mockup approval
Schedule meeting for authentication flow issues

zoom_meetings.transcript: Client: We like the overall approach but have concerns about the timeline. Manager: We can adjust the timeline if needed. User: I can accelerate the development by prioritizing core features. Client: That sounds good. We also want to add the analytics dashboard. Manager: We'll include that in the revised proposal. User: I'll update the proposal by end of day.
zoom_meetings.summary: Client provided feedback on proposal. Timeline concerns addressed. Analytics dashboard to be added. User to update proposal.
action_items: Submit revised proposal by end of day

zoom_meetings.transcript: Designer: Here are the mockups for the new feature. User: The layout looks good, but I have concerns about the mobile responsiveness. Designer: I can adjust the mobile breakpoints. Manager: The color scheme needs to match our brand guidelines. Designer: I'll update the colors and mobile layout. User: Please send the updated mockups by tomorrow.
zoom_meetings.summary: Reviewed design mockups. Mobile responsiveness and color scheme need updates. Designer to provide updated mockups.
action_items: Adjust color scheme to match brand

asana_tasks.name: Complete API integration
asana_tasks.description: Finish integrating the payment API with the main application

asana_tasks.name: Review design mockups
asana_tasks.description: Review and approve the new feature design mockups

asana_tasks.name: Update client proposal
asana_tasks.description: Revise the client proposal based on feedback from today's meeting

asana_tasks.name: Fix authentication bug
asana_tasks.description: Resolve the login authentication issue reported by QA

asana_tasks.name: Write documentation
asana_tasks.description: Create user documentation for the new feature

asana_tasks.name: Setup development environment
asana_tasks.description: Configure the new development environment for the team

asana_tasks.name: Code review for payment module
asana_tasks.description: Review the payment module code changes submitted by the team

asana_tasks.name: Prepare presentation for stakeholders
asana_tasks.description: Create presentation slides for the quarterly stakeholder meeting
